channel.title: CSOH - Cloud Security News
channel.description: Latest cloud security news curated by Cloud Security Office Hours. Covers AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes vulnerabilities, breaches, and more.

item.title: PromptSpy is the first known Android malware to use generative AI at runtime
item.description: Researchers have discovered the first known Android malware to use generative AI in its execution flow, using Google's Gemini model to adapt its persistence across different devices. [...]
